焚書坑儒.definition: to burn the Confucian classics and bury alive the Confucian scholars (acts supposedly committed by the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2])

焚毀.definition: to burn down; to destroy with fire

焚燒.definition: to burn; to set on fire

焚燬.definition: to burn down; to destroy with fire

焚琴煮鶴.definition: lit. to burn zithers and cook cranes; fig. to waste valuable resources; to destroy wantonly beautiful things

焚硯.definition: to destroy one's ink-slab (i.e. to write no more because others write so much better)

焚膏繼晷.definition: to burn the midnight oil (idiom); to work continuously night and day

焚香敬神.definition: to burn incense in prayer to a God
